fileheader.author: Brent Hugh
fileheader.description: Sopwith Camel with Weapons, matches available data for climb, max speed, general handling

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_damp
function.description: Roll moment due to roll rate

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_yaw
function.description: Roll moment due to yaw rate

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_damp
function.description: Pitch moment due to pitch rate

function.description: Pitch moment due to alpha rate

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_moment_gyroscopic_jsbsim_correction
function.description: This reverses the pitch moment due to the gyrosopic action of the propeller, which JSBSim seems to have reversed

function.name: aero/moment/Yaw_damp
function.description: Yaw moment due to yaw rate

function.name: aero/moment/Yaw_moment_gyroscopic_jsbsim_correction
function.description: This reverses the yaw moment due to the gyrosopic action of the propeller, which JSBSim seems to have reversed
